messages.title: This Election is your chance to STOP BREXIT AND BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE for Reading West
messages.content: Local teacher Meri O'Connell is standing for the Liberal Democrats, to be our next Member of Parliament for Reading West. She understands the damage Brexit could do to all our futures. Johnson’s deal is the start of negotiations on our future, not the end! Brexit will dominate our lives for years and years if we don’t stop it now. The Lib Dems have shown they will work across the party divides to bring you a greener, fairer society. Voting Lib Dem is voting for a party that is ready to govern this country and will protect your jobs, your rights, and your planet. It’s time for a better choice than Johnson or Corbyn. Jo Swinson has shown clear and principled leadership on the most important issue of our time. Vote Lib Dem and build a brighter future for our children. A vote for Meri is a vote for a proven local champion. Make sure your voice is heard and lend her your vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support remaining in the European Union and stopping Brexit.
Support policies to combat climate change.
Support increased funding for the NHS.
Support constructing more homes to address housing issues.
Support increased investment in the education sector.

community.content: Meri O'Connell lives and works locally. She teaches at a local comprehensive, is a popular Tilehurst councillor, and is a mother of three.

examples: The Conservatives will force a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risks the break-up of the UK.
Who knows where Labour stands on Brexit? Jeremy Corbyn cannot be trusted on Brexit, or to govern the UK.
